DOC.detailed_description: In study aim evaluate outcome deep brain stimulation ( DBS ) continuous intraduodenal levodopa therapy patient advance Parkinson ' disease use Parkinson 's KinetiGraph™ logger ( PKG ) device movement acceleration measure device . A measurement do implantation select therapy . PKG measure automatically every two minute movement select limb ( usually affect upper extremity ) six day . At time patient keep write diary his/her Parkinsonian symptom . Diary collect PKG data compare . PKG also remind vibration patient time drug administration patient confirm press button PKG . The collect data transmit computer analyze mathematically produce visual graph daily movement . The aim evaluate PKG 's usability measuring Parkinsonian symptom evaluation outcome DBS levodopa therapy . Main parameter evaluation bradykinesia score dyskinesia score .
